gataluwa wanuye janadhipathiwaraya siya mathiwarana prakashaye porondu wu karunu walata anuwa mewani thathwa athi wima anumatha kala nohaki wimaya.melesa me rata thula sidu wana waradi sahagatha yayi samanya janathawata therena siyalu de pilibanda bodu bala sena lesa apata athi gatalu wanuye ·buddha shasanaye pawathmata hani paminima ·sinhala jathiye pawathmata hani paminima ·jathika aarakshawa tharjanayakata lak wima ·rate bhaumika akhandathawaya tharjanayakata lak wima ·rate swabhawika sampath tharjanayakata lak wima ·deshapalana sthawarathwaya binda watima, rate eekiya nayakathwayak nomathi wima ·parlimenthuwa, amathya mandalaya athulu widhayakaye, wyawastha dayakaye ha adhikaranaye wu prajathanthriya pawathmata ha wyuhayata wadagath aayathana halluwata ha wihiluwata path wana parisarayak nirmanaya wi thibima ·janathawata wagakiwayuthu palanayak ahimi wu parisarayak nirmanaya wima.
